author: Special Correspondent
text:
New bus routes were on Sunday inaugurated at the Perundurai bus stand to strengthen connectivity to the surroundings from the bustling town.

Two new services: one between Perundurai and Sivagiri via Railway Station, Vellode, Anumanpalli, Arachalur, and Vilakethi, and the other between Perundurai and Munampalli via SIPCOT Industrial Growth Centre, Kasipilampalayam, Pallakattur and Kambiliampatti have been introduced.

The B-7 bus currently plying between Perundurai and Karumanjirai via Olapalayam, Ponmudi, Pudupalayam, Saralai, Vijayamangalam, and Pallakavundampalayam will be operated along additional routes. The 12-B bus plying from Perundurai to Thudupathi has been extended to Veerachipalayam.

Environment Minister Thoppu N.D. Venkatachalam commissioned the new routes in the presence of District Collector S. Prabakar.
title: New bus routes inaugurated
